\tFinish answering all the questions?\nYou will be shown with the final result.\n\t\t\t\tProceed to end this test?
Do you really want to quit the test?

This Test Simulation is for class A driving license.
	To be able to get this license, you have to be over 17 years old.
	This test consists of 30 multiple-choice driving theory questions.
	To pass the test, you must get at least 21 correct answers of the total

This Test Simulation is for class A public driving license.
	To be able to get this license, you have to be over 20 years old.
	This test consists of 30 multiple-choice driving theory questions.
	To pass the test, you must get at least 21 correct answers of the total
